name: Circle Dash (Folaven)
description:
Arcade game made for the VGL game jam 2021.

Make the highest score by dashing into enemies.

Controls: 

  • Move left:      left arrow
  • Move right:    right arrow
  • Dash:              up arrow

Game made using GameMaker 2

Resources used:

  • https://freesound.org/people/Timbre/sounds/74245/
  • https://freesound.org/people/Temp6754/sounds/535905/
  • https://freesound.org/people/SoundsnapFX/sounds/584207/
  • https://freesound.org/people/DExUS5/sounds/361686/
  • https://freesound.org/people/frankum/sounds/384468/
